member.name: M:Rrd.SpecflowSelenium.Service.GenericService.GenericMethods.Start_Scenario
member.summary: This method called implicitly BEFORE each test run. This also calls the start() method to launch the browser.

member.name: M:Rrd.SpecflowSelenium.Service.GenericService.GenericMethods.end
member.summary: This method is called implicitly AFTER each test run. The HTML and Excel test reports are created and appended in the end() method.

member.name: M:Rrd.SpecflowSelenium.Service.GenericService.GenericMethods.start
member.summary: Launches the browser specified in the application. The start() method is called implicitly in the Before Scenario before each test run.

member.name: M:Rrd.SpecflowSelenium.Service.GenericService.GenericMethods.Submit(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Use to submit forms. There are some restrictions; Element “type” should be “Submit” and the button should be inside the "form" tag. If the “type” is button and the "form" is outside the tag then use the “Click” method.

member.summary: Use to close the browser window that the driver has focus of.

member.name: M:Rrd.SpecflowSelenium.Service.GenericService.GenericMethods.Quit
member.summary: Closes all the browser windows and calls Dispose method which will safely end the session.

member.name: M:Rrd.SpecflowSelenium.Service.GenericService.GenericMethods.VerifyElementPresent(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Use to find if an element is present. This method uses findElement(By.) by the attribute value specified. This method does has no return value, uses reporting when a test fails. IsElementPresent() performs the same function and has a return value.
member.param: Pass the name of the element. This parameter is for reporting only.

member.name: M:Rrd.SpecflowSelenium.Service.GenericService.GenericMethods.VerifyElementNotPresent(System.String,System.String,System.String)

member.param: Pass the name of the element. This parameter is for reporting only.

member.name: M:Rrd.SpecflowSelenium.Service.GenericService.GenericMethods.VerifyElementVisible(System.String,System.String,System.String)

member.param: Pass the name of the element. This parameter is for reporting only.

member.name: M:Rrd.SpecflowSelenium.Service.GenericService.GenericMethods.VerifyElementNotVisible(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Use to find if an element is NOT displayed. This method uses Dispayed() to get a value indicating whether or not this element is displayed.
member.param: Pass the name of the element. This parameter is for reporting only.

member.name: M:Rrd.SpecflowSelenium.Service.GenericService.GenericMethods.WaitForElementNotPresentVisible(System.String,System.String,System.String)
